name: Lifespan Candle
description:
Lifespan Candle is a puzzle platformer game where you control a cute little candle with an unfortunately short lifespan. You can use water to extend its life, ignite fire on woods and swallow pills to regenerate a little bit of wax.

This games was made in 6 days for the Weekly Game Jam #160 with the theme "Nothing stays Forever".

Controls:
- WASD or Arrow keys to move.
- "R" to reset the level. 

Credits:
All the assets were made by me.
8bit sound effects made with Bfxr and Freesound.org.
Background music by Playonloop.
